snippet: BARNETT--Ralph, January 11th. We mourn the sudden loss of a loving husband, father, father-in-law, grandfather, brother, brother-in-law, uncle and true friend. May he have fair winds and following seas. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BARNETT--Ralph, January 11th. We mourn the sudden loss of a loving husband, father, father-in-law, grandfather, brother, brother-in-law, uncle and true friend. May he have fair winds and following seas. 1/3
